detail_desc: Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles, and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides.
Metal hoop earrings with thin metal chain and sparkly stone tassels. Length 19 cm.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.
Straight-cut shirt in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Two open chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves with gathered elastication to create a puff effect. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Hat in a sturdy, rib-knit cotton blend with a wide turned-up hem.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Dress in soft velour with a rounded collar, decorative bow at the front, buttons at the back and cap sleeves. Gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping, and a skirt lined with two layers of tulle. Lined.
Hat in braided straw with a chiffon band. Width of brim 5.5 cm.
Short, fitted top in jersey with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, inset lace trims below the bust and a pompom trim around the neckline and hem.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sandals with square toes, covered block heels and an adjustable strap with a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10 cm.

Dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with a heart-shaped chest pocket and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Press-studs at the sides, a fake fly, front and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Knee-length, sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, wrapover top, decorative gathers at the shoulders and a smocked seam at the waist. Practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Satin top in a relaxed fit with a lace section at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short V-neck dress in jersey with a heavy drape. 3/4-length sleeves, concealed pockets in the side seams and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Longer cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and no buttons.

Sports bralette in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Racer back with a cut-out detail. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.

Shirt in a textured premium cotton weave with contrasting colour details on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Cutaway collar, French front, yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length dress in an airy weave with embroidery in shimmering thread. V-neck and extra-wide, softly draping sleeves. High, tapered waist with a wide, inset trim and a gathered skirt with soft draping. Unlined.
Metal earrings decorated with sparkly beads, pompoms and tassels.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs with stripes down the sides.
Fitted lace blouse with raw edges and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Partially lined.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Wide, shorter-style top in cotton jersey with cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tie in a solid colour and a matching, spotted handkerchief in satin. Width of tie 6.5 cm, size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Lined triangle bikini top with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Short cotton twill skirt with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and visible seams front and back.
Jacket in soft pile with a high collar, large patch front pockets and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Lined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Two macramé bracelets and four elastic bracelets with wooden and stone beads.
Hairband in cotton chambray with a decorative knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly with decorative buttons, and patch front pockets. Tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Metal earrings with pearly beads made from recycled acrylic. Length 7 cm.
A-line dress in thin, patterned sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a detachable belt in braided imitation suede and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sandals with narrow foot straps and fluted soles. Heel 1 cm.
Patterned jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

5-pocket shorts in stretch, supersoft denim. Regular waist with a concealed drawstring at the front and covered elastication at the back, a zip fly and button, and slim legs that finish just above the knees.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and tie belt. Fake fly, side pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline trimmed with a decorative, embroidered band and a V-shaped opening at the front with twisted ties at the top. Long sleeves with smocked cuffs, a gathered seam with a small frill trim at the waist and a skirt with a flounced hem. Unlined.
Metal hair clips decorated with a fabric bow. Width 5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, print motif and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length dress in jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Unlined.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front.
Short shorts in cotton canvas with a high waist, zip fly and button, patch front pockets and fake back pockets with a flap.
Large metal earrings decorated with faceted glass stones. Length 8 cm.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Long-sleeved hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with embroidered text on the front, a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Hat in braided paper straw with embroidered details at the front and ears on top. Cotton lining. Width of brim approx. 3.5 cm.
Hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter of largest pair 3 cm. Diameter of smallest pair approx. 1 cm. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem.
Trousers in a softly draping Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave with wide, covered elastication at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Fitted top in jersey crêpe with decorative straps at the back. Narrow cut at the top with ties at the back of the neck. Lined.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, a zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an intarsia-knit front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in light sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, print motif on the front and ribbed cuffs.
Leotard in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined gusset.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with an all-over print and regular, elasticated waist. Side pockets, low crotch and tapered legs.
Bikini top with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups, a draped detail at the front, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.

Medium-coverage underwired bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shorts in printed lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
Sandals with adjustable foot straps and a loop at the back. Moulded thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles, fluted underneath.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Gathers at the shoulders and a seam with ties at the waist. Lined.

Set with a top, pair of leggings and hat in soft cotton. Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Hat in double-layered jersey.
Weekend bag in imitation leather with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap, two handles and a zip at the top, and studs on the bottom. Two inner compartments. Lined. Size approx. 22x31x48 cm.
Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Voluminous dress in lightly crinkled chiffon made from recycled polyester. V-neck front and back and an asymmetric yoke that continues over the sleeves. Sleeves with a gathered seam half-way down, balloon finish, and cuffs with a narrow trim and drawstring. The dress is in a straight cut with gathered seams to create full, soft draping. Discreet pockets in the side seams and a zip at the back. Partly lined in chiffon.
Slim-fit jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, and narrow hems.
